selectAccount.name: Select Account
selectAccount.desc: Select the account you want to use.

isConvertToWebP.name: Convert images to WebP
isConvertToWebP.desc: When enabled, images are converted to WebP format and uploaded. At the same time, the image quality is reduced, so you can expect to save drive space.

multiLinePostingSection.name: Separator character for multi-line posting
multiLinePostingSection.desc: The character used as a separator when posting multiple lines of text to Misskey. Use \n to represent a line break.

accountHeading.name: Account
accountHeading.desc: You are currently using this account

memo.name: Memo
memo.desc: This is not used by the program. It is an item for memoizing what kind of account it is.

domain.name: Domain
domain.desc: Please enter your Misskey domain. This is the part of `https://misskey.io/@username` that is `misskey.io`.

prevText.name: Text to add before posting
prevText.desc: Enter the text to add before posting. Use \n to represent a line break.

postText.name: Text to add after posting
postText.desc: Enter the text to add after posting. Use \n to represent a line break.

isFileNameHidden.name: Hide file name
isFileNameHidden.desc: When turned on, the file name displayed in Misskey will be the time of posting, so you can hide the Vault file name. It does not affect the Vault file name.

visibility.name: Visibility
visibility.desc: Select the visibility of the post. Direct is not supported.
visibility.valueError: The value of the visibility is invalid. The visibility should be one of public, home, or followers. (Direct is not supported)

uploadAllowedList.name: List of files allowed to be uploaded
uploadAllowedList.desc: Enter a list of files allowed to be uploaded separated by commas.

embedFormat.name: Embed format
embedFormat.desc: If you don't like using HTML for embedding, you can choose Markdown format. The Markdown format does not support previews of videos and other media.
embedFormat.valueError: The embed format has an invalid value. Please set the appropriate embed format.

tokenSetting.name: Generate (or regenerate) access token
tokenSetting.desc: Use this when you first start up or accidentally delete your API key. Do not press this button if the setting is complete.
tokenSetting.domainNotSet: The domain is not set. Please set it from the settings screen.
tokenSetting.timeOut: Authentication timed out. Please generate the access token again.

deleteAccount.name: Delete Account from Obsidian
deleteAccount.desc: When executed, all settings of the account registered in Obsidian will be deleted. No effect on Misskey
deleteAccount.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the account?
deleteAccount.selectedAccountError: You cannot delete the account because it is selected for posting. Please select another account and then delete it.
deleteAccount.lastAccountError: You cannot delete the account because only one account is registered.
deleteAccount.accountDeleted: The Misskey account information has been deleted from Obsidian.

thisFileTypeIsNotAllowed: This file is not allowed to be uploaded (changeable from settings):
imageCannotBeUploaded: The image could not be uploaded.
noteCannotBeSend: The note could not be sent.
noteCannotBeQuoted: The note could not be quoted.
noteIsHidden: This note is private. The account you selected may be incorrect.
emojiCannotBeFetched: The emoji could not be fetched:
selectedAccountNotFoundError: The selected account does not exist. If you get this error without any special operation, please contact the author.
domainNotSetError: The domain is not set. Please set it from the settings screen.
accountTokenNotSetError: The access token is not set. Please set it from the settings screen.
multiLinePostingSectionNotSetError: The separator character for multi-line posting is not set. Please set it from the settings screen.
embedFormatValueError: The embed format has an invalid value. Please set the appropriate embed format.
visibilityValueError: The visibility has an invalid value. The visibility should be one of public, home, or followers. (Direct is not supported)
